Charlie: "Bob, that's a lie! If I were the mafioso, why accuse me so openly? You're probably trying to deflect suspicion from yourself."

You: "Diana, please trust my detective findings. Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote for him to save the town."

Charlie was arrested
